derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from late Latin granulum (see granule) + -ar

entry.tran: 由颗粒组成的;含颗粒的;颗粒状的
entry.def: Granular substances are composed of a lot of granules, or feel or look as if they are composed of a lot of granules.

means.word_mean: 1. composed of or covered with relatively large particles;
2. having a granular structure like that of chondrites
